name: 3. ClickUp Stage = "Interviewing 2" -> Send Email Inviting to Interview Stage

variables.name: emailHtml
variables.value:
Hi {{2.custom_fields.`First Name`}},

Thanks so much for the great interview. It was great getting to know you.

We'd like to invite you in for our final interviewafter this, assuming you're accepted, you'll receive a job offer and be invited to work directly with us. Please book using this link: Peter's calendar.

We look forward to learning more about you. Let us know here if you have any questionsthanks!

Best wishes,
1SecondCopy Team

mapper.subject: Congratulations {{2.custom_fields.First}}! We'd like to have you for an interview.
